item.description:
This event will focus on strategy games.  Unlike word games which focus on your language skills, card games which focus on your ability to create patterns and sets and party games which test your general knowledge and creativity, strategy games involve executive level functions.  For example, some games involve money management, others involve timing and planning ahead, some involve designing military planning etc.

Some examples of strategy games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • 7 Wonders
  • Carcassonne
  • Ra
  • Cutthroat Caverns
  • Dominion
  • Ticket to Ride
  • Pandemic
  • Settlers of Catan
  • Medici

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night so please bring your favorites. If necessary, we divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

---

Food:

Light refreshments will be served, however you are encourage to bring additional food or drink to share with the group.

---

About the Location:

This event is hosted at a private residence in a condo complex.  You will need to call to be let in.  The phone number to call will be sent out to attendees the day before the event.

There is a wonderful but shy cat on the premises.  If you have allergies, but would still like to attend, please message the event host.

There is extremely limited guest parking in the complex (which is an old brick schoolhouse).  You are best suited to find parking on Rantoul Street, School Street or Edwards Street.
